EmailTemplate.subject: Introduction to BAH Account Enrollment Manager (1363274877.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Andy, I wanted to reach out to you and introduce you to the Enrollment Manager that will handle your account while you are working with BAH, Brendon Dillon. I have included a link to Brendan’s calendar below that you can use to schedule a time to speak with him as things move forward. I have already given him some background from our call on Monday. https://my.timedriver.com/19H5R <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/19H5R?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfFtYtkh0%2BP%2BYAq7gnjzMNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Please let me know if you have any questions for me. Thank you,Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <bbentley@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=taylor> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them.
